ARABIC: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلْكَوَاكِبِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We have adorned the lowest heaven with the beauty of the planets
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He decked the nearest heavens with ornaments of stars,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We have adorned the lower heaven with the adornment of the stars
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We have decked the lower heavens with stars
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We have indeed adorned the lowest heaven with stars as ornaments.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, We have adorned the near heaven with the stars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely We have adorned the nearest heaven with an adornment, the stars,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We have adorned the lower heaven with the adornment of the stars
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! We have adorned the lowest heaven with an ornament, the planets;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We have adorned the lowest heaven with the beauty of the planets;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily We! We have adorned the nearest heaven with an adornment: the stars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed We have adorned the lowest heaven with the finery of the stars,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We have indeed decked the lower heaven with beauty (in) the stars,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily! We have adorned the near heaven with the stars (for beauty).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We have adorned the lower heaven with the adornment of the planets,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We have adorned the lower heaven with the beauty of the planets.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, We have adorned the nearest heaven with an adornment of stars
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:6] We have indeed adorned the lowest heaven with an adornment, the stars, that is to say, [adorned] with their light or with them [the stars] (the genitive annexation [bi-zīnati’l-kawākib] is for explication; similarly [explicative] is the reading of bi-zīnatin, ‘with an adornment’, with nunation, [the adornment] explained as being ‘the stars’);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! We have adorned the lowest heaven) the first heaven (with an ornament, the planets) He says: the first heaven is adorned with planets:
